p: Figure 2 shows the transmission electron microscopy (CM200, Philips, Bend, OR, USA) image of MWCNT ( Figure 2a) and SEM images of the pure PS and PS/CNT samples. The morphology results of the as-prepared PS and PS/CNT nanofibrous membranes, shown in Figure 2bâ€“e, indicate the regular distribution of nanofibers from the electrospinning technique. These well distributed and randomly oriented nanofibers create a porous rough surface for the PS nanocomposite membranes.
